Question 1

```{r}
x <- list(2, 4, 5, 9, 1)
y <- list(8, 7, 2, 8, 3)
z <- list(1, 8, 5, 4, 2)
(pmap_dbl(list(x,y,z), sum))^2
```

Question 2

```{r}
tribble( ~Student,  ~Gender,    ~Salary,
                   "John",   "Male",       65000,
                   "Alice",  "Female",    73000,
                    "Juan",   "Male",       66000,
                    "Beth",  "Female",    71500,
                    "Denise", "Female",  82000
) -> table
table
table %>% 
  pmap_chr(~ str_glue(" {..1} who is {..2}, has a salary that is {..3} dollars per year"))
```

Question 3
```{r}
c <- matrix( nrow = 5, ncol = 5)
for (m in 1:5) {
  for (n in 1:5) {
    c[m, n] <- (m + n)
  }
}
print(c)
```
